metadata.title: CVE-2024-6384 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: "Hot" backup files may be downloaded by underprivileged users, if they arecapable of acquiring a unique backup identifier. This issue affects MongoDBEnterprise Server v6.0 versions prior to 6.0.16, MongoDB Enterprise Serverv7.0 versions prior to 7.0.11 and MongoDB Enterprise Server v7.3 versionsprior to 7.3.3

criterions.comment: mongodb package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
